cards.name: Candlestick Maker
cards.description:
+1 Action
+1 Buy
Take a Coin token.

cards.name: Stonemason
cards.description:
Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.
----------
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

cards.name: Doctor
cards.description:
Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back in any order.
----------
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.

cards.name: Masterpiece
cards.description:
Worth $1
----------
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid,Â gain a Silver.

cards.name: Advisor
cards.description:
+1 Action
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card and put the rest into your hand.

cards.name: Herald
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it.
----------
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it onto your deck.

cards.name: Plaza
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
You may discard a Treasure to take a Coin token.

cards.name: Taxman
cards.description: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals they can't). Gain a Treasure onto your deck costing up to $3 more than it.

cards.name: Baker
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Take a Coin token.
----------
Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

cards.name: Butcher
cards.description: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand. If you do, pay any number of Coin tokens, and gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

cards.name: Journeyman
cards.description: Name a card. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 3 cards without that name. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Merchant Guild
cards.description:
+1 Buy
+$1
----------
While this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

cards.name: Soothsayer
cards.description: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse, and if they did, draws a card.
